details.description: Find out what you need to know to choose the right premises for your business - business location, working from home
details.video_summary: Find out what you need to know to make sure you choose the right premises for your business.

details.description: Includes Self Assessment, self-employment and starting a business
Information about starting up and running a business in the UK, including help if you're self employed or a sole trader.
Steps to turn your business idea into a product or service you can sell and that meets your customers' needs
Find out where you can get information about your business market and how to use this to improve your business - business strategy, knowledge management
Find out what you need to know before deciding whether to rent or buy your business premises - rent premises, buy premises
